dtparam=audio=on
dtparam=krnbt=on
dtparam=uart1=on

# CPU
arm_boost=1

[all]
start_x=1
enable_uart=1
uart_2ndstage=1
arm_64bit=1
enable_gic=1
kernel=u-boot.bin
armstub=bl31.bin
camera_auto_detect=1

dtoverlay=dwc2
dtoverlay=vc4-kms-v3d

max_framebuffers=2

# Automatically load overlays for detected DSI displays
display_auto_detect=1

dtoverlay=cma,cma-512
dtoverlay=rpivid-v4l2

# USB
dtoverlay=dwc2,dr_mode=peripheral
[cm4]
dtoverlay=dwc2,dr_mode=host
[all]

# Fan
dtoverlay=gpio-fan,gpiopin=18,temp=50000

# CM4 external Wi-Fi antenna
dtparam=ant2

# I2C for argonfan
dtparam=i2c1=on
dtparam=i2c_arm=on

# RPI 4 headless boot fix
hdmi_force_hotplug=1 

# Force performance governor during boot
initial_turbo=60

# Moderate OC Profile
over_voltage=5
arm_freq=1800
gpu_freq=600
core_freq=550
v3d_freq=600
h264_freq=550
